attributes.action: Keep Barmouth  bridge open to walkers
attributes.background: Gwynedd council want to close Barmouth bridge to walkers to help cut costs as they say they have to pay Network Rail £30,000 a year so walkers can cross. This would be a significant blow to walkers who use the Mawddach trail and businesses in Barmouth

rejection.details:
We cannot approve your petition as the issue that it covers is not something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The decision on whether to keep the bridge open to walkers would be the responsibility of Gwynedd Council. 

You could contact local councillors about this issue. You can use this page to find out who the local councillors are and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
